title: Defamation like Jewish people
common: On this page we list people that were classified as Jewish to create persecution, or mistakes during researchs.
All families that had defamation as Jewish in SÃ£o Paulo by Camargo's family during civil war (Taunay, Affonso d'E., 1953, 36-68) are identified with "(Pires X Camargo)".

value.name: Bettinck/Betting/Betim: Descendants of Gerhart Bettinck (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: It was not detected defamation directly connected to him, but he had marriage with a Fernandes, his family received defamation.

value.name: Dias (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: There is not any primary source to sustain he is a Jewish, but a partial primary source was used to do him Jewish in the 19th century.

value.name: Fernandes: Descendants of Manuel Fernandes Ramos (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: Initially declared a Jewish person by Francisco Camargo, "o tigre", he was again declared a Jewish person in the 19th century thanks to a partial primary source of a descendant.
